title: Tarot Aromatherapy
description: Tarot Aromatherapy presents the 22 Major Arcana cards of the Tarot as living archetypes who can be accessed for personal empowerment and transformation.Included within this book are descriptive meanings for each of the 22 Major Arcana or Soul cards, along with a combination of three aromatherapy oils that correspond to them.The healing action of the essential oils is described, making it super clear as to how they relate to the card. Aromatherapy itself is addressed, and specific directions are give so you can make Tarot blends for yourself.The Tarot Archetype Process (TAP) is a new and unique process that allows you to access and use, the gifts, skills and knowledge of the ancient Tarot Archetypes. This is a process you can work through step by step yourself, or as a professional Reader or Healer you can use it to support your clients.A powerful blending of Tarot Archetype to Natural Healing - this information will be of great interest to Tarot lovers and Aromatherapy enthusiasts alike.
author: Karen Seinor
